custom_nodes.author: BlenderNeko
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Noise [Dr.Lt.Data hotfix version]
custom_nodes.description: There is an issue when using a mask with the Unsampler node in the current ComfyUI Noise extension, causing errors. This fork provides a HOTFIX for this issue. Once [PR-13]((https://github.com/BlenderNeko/ComfyUI_Noise/pull/13) is merged in the future, this fork will become obsolete.
